languages.text: {n}Серый Вортен кивает каждому слову господина, слизывая свежую кровь с тонкого клинка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Серый Вортен кивает каждому слову господина, слизывая свежую кровь с тонкого клинка.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: {n}Worten the Grey nods at every word of his master, licking the fresh blood off a thin blade.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten el Gris asiente para enfatizar cada palabra de su amo mientras lame la sangre fresca de una espada de hoja fina.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey nods at every word of his master, licking the fresh blood off a thin blade.{/n}

traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾一边舔着薄薄刀刃上的鲜血，一边听着主人的话。每听到一句话，他就点一次头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey nods at every word of his master, licking the fresh blood off a thin blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾一边舔着薄薄刀刃上的鲜血，一边听着主人的话。每听到一句话，他就点一次头。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: {n}Worten le Gris hoche la tête à chacun des mots de son maître, tout en léchant le sang frais qui macule sa lame.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey nods at every word of his master, licking the fresh blood off a thin blade.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイは、細い刃についた鮮血を舐め取りながら、主の言葉一つ一つにうなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey nods at every word of his master, licking the fresh blood off a thin blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイは、細い刃についた鮮血を舐め取りながら、主の言葉一つ一つにうなずく。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: {n}Worten der Graue nickt bei jedem Wort seines Herren und leckt das frische Blut von einer dünnen Klinge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey nods at every word of his master, licking the fresh blood off a thin blade.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gri Worten, efendisinin ağzından çıkan her sözle birlikte başını eğerek ince bıçağının üzerindeki taze kanı yalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey nods at every word of his master, licking the fresh blood off a thin blade.{/n}
